title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Sales in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 12 data points.
Overall Sales in million U.S. dollars has decreased over the Year.
Sales in million U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2025 to 2023, roughly constant from 2023 to 2021, and lastly slightly decreasing from 2021 to 2014.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2024 and 2023.
Max Sales in million U.S. dollars about 2332.0 was recorded at Year 2023
Min Sales in million U.S. dollars about 1084.0 was recorded at Year 2014
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Sales in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 12 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely decreasing which exists from 2023 to 2014.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is slightly increasing which exists from 2025 to 2023.
